Package RobotProjectGUI

Class RobotArena

java.lang.Object
RobotProjectGUI.RobotArena
public class RobotArena extends Object
Author:
dijan Class that handles all ArenaItem objects in an array list.

  • Method Details

    • anyCollisions

      public boolean anyCollisions(ArenaItem item1, MyCanvas mc)
      Checks the object against all other objects in the arena to make sure there are no collisions. If the object is touching a party infected robot/party obstacle, it also infects it. If one of the objects are a bullet, they are both destroyed.
      Parameters:
      item1 - item in the arena
      mc - Canvas needed when checking for a hungry robot, as change in size would require to see if it is in arena boundaries.
      Returns:
      If a collision has occurred.

    • getArenaItemAt

      public ArenaItem getArenaItemAt(double x, double y)
      checks to see what robot is at those particular coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - Coordinate of the location being checked.
      y - Coordinate of the location being checked.
      Returns:
      Object on that position if it exists, otherwise null.

    • updateSystem

      public void updateSystem(MyCanvas mc)
      Constantly updating positions of each object, taking into consideration collisions.
      Parameters:
      mc - Canvas needed when updating its position, as it needs to check if it is in the arena's boundaries.

    • addObject

      public void addObject(ArenaItem object)
      Adds new item to arena list
      Parameters:
      object - The object that will be added to the arena list.

    • destroyObject

      public void destroyObject(ArenaItem object)
      Removes selected item from arena list
      Parameters:
      object - The object that will be removed to the arena list.

    • drawSystem

      public void drawSystem(MyCanvas mc)
      Draws each object onto canvas
      Parameters:
      mc - Canvas needed so each robot can be drawn on the canvas.

    • moveControllableRobots

      public void moveControllableRobots(MyCanvas mc, char direction)
      Checks all controllable robots that exist, and moves them to the direction the user inputted.
      Parameters:
      mc - Canvas needed as the movement methods change the robot's position in the canvas.
      direction - Directions the user has inputted.

    • shootAllBullets

      public ArrayList<Bullet> shootAllBullets()
      Looks for all Controllable Robots and shoots a bullet out of them
      Returns:
      All the bullets that need to be shot out.

    • clearArena

      public void clearArena()
      Removes all items from arena

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Output each object's information such as ID, x and y.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • fileString

      public String fileString()
      Outputs necessary information needed of each object so it can be saved
      Returns:
      All of the ArenaItems' essential information in order.
